name: delani-node
description:
[![Netlify Status](https://api.netlify.com/api/v1/badges/6e57f65e-9d24-44ef-968b-a3afd3a98aec/deploy-status)](https://kmakamu-delanistudio.netlify.app/) [![Code style: black](https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg)](https://github.com/kelvinMakamu/delaniStudio) [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://github.com/kelvinMakamu/delaniStudio/blob/master/LICENSE) ## Brief Description
The application provides look and feel of a fictional studio site. The page outlines all the information about the studio

It provides details about the services provided by the fictional studio. There is a showcase of the projects already worked on by the studio.

The landing page has the following functioanlities:
* Site Responsiveness * Client-side Events * Form Validation * Form Submission * API Integration
